title: NGRX Tslint Rules
author: inlustra
content: readme.md ngrx tslint rules was hastily thrown together fully tested, welcome feedback.ngrx-action-class-suffixautofixabledescription pick any class implements action enforce suffix be placed that class name, defaults 'action'example"ngrx-action-class-suffix": [true, "customsuffix"]error:export class userbuttonsubmit implements action { }success:export class userbuttonsubmitcustomsuffix implements action { }ngrx-action-type-property-nameautofixabledescription enforce case naming conventions any object terminating the desired suffix, defaults actiontypes constant_caseexample"ngrx-action-type-property-name": [ true, "actiontypes", "constant"]error:export const useractiontypes = { userbuttonsubmit: 'user submit button', usertextsubmit: type('user submit text')}success:export const useractiontypes = { user_button_submit: 'user submit button', user_text_submit: type('user submit text')}ngrx-action-type-property-valueautofixabledescription require property name be displayed within property value case changes the object name terminates the given suffix, defaults actiontypes 'title case'.example"ngrx-action-type-property-value": [ true, "actiontypes", "title", true, "title"]error:export const useractiontypes = { user_button_submit: 'user submit button', user_text_submit: type('user submit text')}success:export const useractiontypes = { user_button_submit: '[user] user button submit', user_text_submit: type('[user] user text submit')}added rule require actiontype prefix inside property value.notes of above case strings be replaced those available here: npm casesupports:camel: 'thisisniceandtidynathan',snake: 'this_is_nice_and_tidy_nathan',kebab: '-is-nice--tidy-nathan',upper: ' is nice tidy, nathan.',lower: ' is nice tidy, nathan.',header: '-is-nice--tidy-nathan',sentence: ' is nice tidy, nathan.',capital: ' is nice tidy, nathan.',title: ' is nice tidy, nathan.',constant: 'this_is_nice_and_tidy_nathan'todowrite rule will detect an action class uses type outside the allowed rules, example:export class myaction implements action { type = quoteactionslist.my_action;}should export class myaction implements action { type = quoteactiontypes.my_action;}
